text: Matthew Olanipekun Sadiku from the Prairie View A&M; University, Cypress, TX was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for contributions to computational electromagnetics and engineering education. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:African-American academics Category:Nigerian emigrants to the United States Category:African-American engineers Category:Prairie View A&M; University people Category:Microwave engineers Category:American electrical engineers Category:Nigerian electrical engineers Category:Electrical engineering academics
title: Matthew N.O. Sadiku
